description.translate: EM Wave Change! Aidan Stelar, On-Air!

condition.check: player.getData('skyhighheroes:dyn/calling_timer') > 0 && damage.hasDamageType('WAVE_WIND') && damage.hasDamageType('WAVE_ICE') && damage.hasDamageType('WAVE_ELECTRICITY') && player.world().isRaining() && player.world().isThundering() && player.world().getLocation(player.pos()).biome().startsWith('Plains') && player.getWornChestplate().suitType() == 'skyhighocs:aidan_stelar'
